names.pinyin: wu fu ma xin gui jiang tang
names.english: decoction of aconite, ephedra, asari, cinnamon and dried ginger
names.commonEnglish: Decoction of Aconite, Ephedra, Asari, Cinnamon and Dried Ginger

actions: Expels Wind-Dampness, disperses Cold, warms and activates the channels and stops pain.
Disperses Cold and Dampness, warms the channels and stops pain.
With Gan Jiang and Gan Cao, strengthens its actions of fortifying Qi and benefiting the Yang.
With Xi Xin, disperses Cold and stops pain.
Dispels Wind-Dampness seeping into the Lower Jiao and warms the channels.
With Zhi Fu Zi, for Cold-Damp Bi.
Induces sweating, releases the Exterior, promotes urination, reduces edema and warms and disperses Cold pathogens.
With Zhi Fu Zi, for Wind-Cold Bi.
With Ma Huang and Zhi Fu Zi, for Exterior Wind-Cold with underlying Yang Deficiency.
Disperses Wind-Cold and Internal Cold and alleviates pain.
With Ma Huang, alleviates Wind-Cold-Damp Bi pain.
With Zhi Fu Zi, for Wind-Damp-Cold Bi with spasms of the joints and intolerable pain.

Releases the Exterior, assists Yang, adjusts the Ying and Wei, releases the muscle layer, warms the channels and collaterals to relieve pain and warms and facilitates the flow of Qi through the channels and collaterals and Blood through the vessels.
With Ma Huang , for Wind-Cold-Damp Bi.
With Zhi Fu Zi, for chills and painful extremities due to Yang Deficiency with Wind-Cold-Damp Bi.
Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.

symptoms: Limited movement of the toes in the case of severe pain
Pain alleviated by warmth and aggravated by Cold
The joints cannot be flexed or extended
Pain worse at night and better during the day
Painful area often feels cold to the touch
Pain mostly affects low back and lower extremities
Pain changes over days or weeks
Maybe chills with a slight fever
manifestations.tongueCoat: Thin and white (thicker than for Wind-Bi)
manifestations.pulse: Superficial and tight or Wiry and tight or Deep, tight and slow

modifications.purpose: limited movement of the toe joints
a heavy sensation of the joints
